card.name: Preem, the Everything
card.text: Whenever you cast an Equipment spell you may pay X , where X is that spell's mana value, if you do create X 1/1 white Wolf creature tokens.

card.name: Zaero, the Void
card.text: {C}, Sacrifice a Permanent: You may cast an Aura from your hand with mana value X or less without paying its mana costs, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed Permanent's mana value.

card.name: Creal, the False Avatar
card.text: Whenever a lore counter is put on a permanent you control, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. Permanents with counters on them have vigilance. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Dreim, the Typhoon
card.text: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Creatures you control with counters on them have evolve. (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than that creature, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Eiren, the Stable
card.text: Enchant commander you control Enchanted creature gets +10/+6 and has trample Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters the battlefield, return a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of lands you control. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is a Elder Aspect.)

card.name: Ganshaw, the Truth
card.text: Enchant commander you control Enchanted creature gets +3/+1 Whenever a Creature with power greater than its toughness attacks, exile the top card of your library, you may cast it until end of turn. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Ill' Omen, the Spirit
card.text: Whenever a modified creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black spirit creature token. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) Creature cards with mana value 4 or less in your graveyard have dredge 2. (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Maliun, the Smog
card.text: Enchant commander you control Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create X 1/1 white Wolf tokens, where X is that spells mana value. Attacking modified creatures you control get +1/+0 and have first strike. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Nine, the Many
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets a permanent you control, you may pay {C}{U}. If you do, Create an Absolvement. (It's an enchantment Aura with "Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each enchantment you control.") Attach it to target creature you control. Modified creatures you control have changeling. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. This card is every creature type.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Orthos, the Tempest
card.text: Enchant commander you control Modified creatures you control have prowess. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Seergost, the Flesh
card.text: Whenever a creature token you control becomes tapped you may scry 2. Do this only once each turn. Tap an untapped nontoken creature you control: Draw a card. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Triem, the Affliction
card.text: Enchant commander you control Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may put a land from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn. Modified creatures have wither. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Unis, the Undisturbed
card.text: Instant cards in your graveyard have Dredge 2. (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.) Whenever you cast a Sorcery spell, you may surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Whirl, the Fierce
card.text: Enchant commander you control Other creatures you control are Dragons in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Nashd, Preem's Carver
Curse of Betrayal
card.text: Enchant player. If a nonland permanent card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead. At the beginning of enchanted player's end step, put all cards exiled with Curse of Betrayal onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Trelin, the Everwake
card.text: Spells you cast have bargain. (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Whenever you a spell, if it was bargained, Add: {B}. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: H, the Pure
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with power greater than its base power enters, you may exile a card from your hand, if you do draw two cards. Do this only once per turn. Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 for each card you own in exile. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Halberd, the Scorched
card.text: Enchant commander you control Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever enchanted creature attacks, exile the top two card of your library, you may play them for as long as they are exiled." Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Nidn, the Counsil
card.text: [+2]: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type. [0]: Create a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with Changeling (This card is every creature type.) [-1]: Exile target multicolored permanent. Nidn, The Counsil can be your commander.

card.name: Viktos, the Mind
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library at any time. You may play the top card of your library by tapping an untapped permanent in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Lorn, the Hunger
card.text: When Lorn, The Hunger enters the battlefield, exile the top X cards of your library, you may cast them for as long as they are exiled. Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a treasure token.

card.name: Wia, the True Avatar
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a lore counter from any number of permanents. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of lore counters removed this way.

card.name: Isul, the Fates
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, mill four cards. {C}: {T}, You may cast target instant card from your graveyard until end of turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Rein, the Stark
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create two 2/2 white Wolf creature tokens. {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Jyce, the Lost
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature card with mana value 2 or less, you may copy it. Whenever you copy a spell put a land from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Urz, the First
card.text: At the beginning of your combat phase, up to three target artifacts you control become 4/4 artifact creatures. Artifact spells you control have evoke {2}. (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: Angmar, the Bladed
card.text: When Angmar, The Bladed enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of permanents, then create that many treasure tokens. Whenever a player sacrifices a token, you add {B}.

card.name: Oloo, the United
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may remove two +1/+1 counters from target permanent you control. If you do, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens. {T}: Sacrifice a creature token, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the sacrificed token's power.

card.name: Balion, the Empty
card.text: If Balion, The Empty is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Balion, The Empty is the chosen color. Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Seer, the Timeless
card.text: If Seer, The Timeless is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Seer, The Timeless is the chosen color.

card.name: Fal, the Alone
card.text: Prowess Instant and sorcery spells you cast have rebound. (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Titan, the Ageless
card.text: This spell cost {1} less for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. Attacking creatures you control that have power 4 or greater get +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Reise, the Headcutter
card.text: This spell costs {2} less for each Equipment you control. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may attach any number of target Equipment you control to Reise.

card.name: Zendikar's Soul
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library. If you do, incubate 1 twice. (To incubate 1, create an Incubator token with a +1/+1 counter on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.) Aspect (You may have two commanders if the other is an Elder.)

card.name: Enols, the Hive
card.text: Whenever a permanent you control deals combat damage, incubate 2. Do this only twice each turn. (To incubate 2, create an Incubator token with two +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.) {WP}, {T}: Transform up to two target Incubator tokens you control.

card.name: Eleas, the Hive
card.text: Artifact creatures you control have +1/+1 and have toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.) {6}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control, except its a 1/1 Phyrexian creature in addition to its other types.
